name: 32-Dice
description:
Do you like puzzles and dice? Do you like 2048?

This game will test your brain with a provocative puzzle, just like the famous games Chess and 2048.

Different rules and randomness will bring to your gameplay unique challenges and guarantee a very funny gameplay.

How to play:

  • Use your arrow keys to move the dice between different positions.
  • Move the dice, noting that they change their values when they are moved according to the following rules:
    • Blue dice: when moved, randomly change the values to one of the even numbers 2,4 and 6
    • Pink dice: when moved, randomly change the values to one of the odd numbers 1,3 and 5
    • Green dice: value is randomly constant (never changes) and can be 1,2,3,4,5 or 6, and never moves
    • Yellow dice: value grows +1 every time it is moved and after value 6 it returns to value 1
    • Purple dice: just like a regular dice, its value changes randomly between 1 and 6 whenever it is moved
  • Get points by colliding dice of the same value.
  • Win the game when you reach 32 points.
  • Keep playing to beat your high score.
